Module nstaley.inventorysystem
Package nstaley.inventorysystem

Class MainFormController

java.lang.Object
nstaley.inventorysystem.MainFormController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class MainFormController extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
This class is the controller for the main form of the inventory management system. It has a table to view the parts and products that are in the inventory system. It also has a search box for both the parts table and the products table. There are buttons to add, modify, and delete both parts and products. There is also a button to exit the program.
Author:
Nicholas Staley

    • toAddPart

      public void toAddPart(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws IOException

      Parameters:
      actionEvent - add button clicked in the part pane
      Throws:
      IOException - can throw an IOException if the file location is not found.

    • toModifyPart

      public void toModifyPart(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws IOException
      Method to take the user to the modify part screen, when the modify part button is clicked and a part is selected in the table view.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - modify button is clicked in part pane
      Throws:
      IOException - can throw an IOException if the file location is not found.

    • searchParts

      public void searchParts(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      Method to search the parts list when an id number or a name has been entered into the search field and the enter button has been hit. Will also return the whole list if the search field is cleared out and entered.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - search text box in part pane and enter key

    • searchProducts

      public void searchProducts(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      Method to search the products list when an id number or a name has been entered into the search field and the enter button has been hit. Will also return the whole list if the search field is cleared out and entered.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - search text box in product pane and enter key

    • deletePart

      public void deletePart(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      Method to delete a part from the part table view. A part must be selected to be able to delete it.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - delete button clicked in parts pane

    • deleteProduct

      public void deleteProduct(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      Method to delete a product from the product table view. A product must be selected and have no associated parts to be able to delete the product.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - delete button clicked in product pane
